reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Construction of the Regional Waste Management Center for Subotica District

description.narrative: The overall aim of the project is the development of a regional waste management to improve access to, and delivery of environmental services and facilities in waste management.The main focus of this contract will be the construction of a regional waste management centre that meet EU Landfill Directive 1999/31/EC. This will improve the waste management system and ultimately result in a cleaner and safer environment.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations (NEAR)
